name: The Talasi
description:
The Talasi
by Collective Name
distributed by ja games

Made for Global Game Jam 2018

by

Alex Choiniere
Jeffrey Fillingham
Ian Johnston
Jenna Marks

at Volta Halifax

Controls:

Arrow keys to move
R to restart a puzzle
Escape to quit

NOTE: The Windows download is the superior version :)

Rules:

Navigate the 3D pigeon to the door. Once you enter, you'll come out as a 2D pigeon. Bring the pigeon down
to the pigeon outline to complete the puzzle.

Background:

A carrier pigeon finds itself lost at the dawn of the electronic communications era. Carrying messages, only
to have the receiver send their replies using the new electonic mediums. This makes the pigeon feel flat.
Objects in the 3D world often present themselves as obstacles in the 2D. Be careful as you take flight to flatness
to deliver your messages through these trying times.
